name: Candy Kingdom VR
description: Candy Kingdom is a wonderful VR candy shooting game! The kingdom needs a new king! Will you be the new king?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 32-64-bit Processor: I5,equivalant or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 , equivalent or newer Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: default sound device Additional Notes: HTC vive required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 32-64-bit Processor: I5,equivalant or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 , equivalent or newer Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: default sound device Additional Notes: HTC vive required

reviews.review_text: This is great, just played it for a while and I have to say i'm very suprised. This is so colorful, the sounds, the candy, a perfect fit. Can't wait to show this to my kids, i'm sure they will enjoy this.  One small note, could you add some different tunes into the game? The current one is a bit repetitive after a while.   Thats the only thing from me! Thumbs up for this one!
This is fun game that all he family can play and is a good example of a VR game you can show to other people as it is easy to pickup and learn and kids will love it.
